title: What's this luscious curvy font?
content:
[http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00006JID4.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418121848/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/B00006JID4.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)   
   
I think even the song titles are set in this font, so it can't be a logotype thingy.
author: anonymous
